title: Privacy Policy
content:
Last updated: April 28, 2025

Hosting and Domain Name

The website is hosted on Cloudflare Pages, and the domain name is also provided by Cloudflare. Cloudflare may collect technical data, such as IP addresses, to ensure the site's security and performance. For more information on how they process these data, please refer to their privacy policy.

Data Collected

I do not collect any personal data through this website. No forms or tracking systems are used to gather information about visitors.

Use of LocalStorage

Your browser's LocalStorage is used solely to store your theme and language preferences as well as your progression of achievements and chests in order to enhance your experience on the website. This information remains on your device and is not sent to any server nor shared with any third parties. You can delete these data at any time via your browser settings.

Browser Cache

The files necessary for the proper functioning of the website (images, CSS, JavaScript, etc.) may be cached by your browser to improve loading times.

Changes

I reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page along with an updated date.

Contact

For any questions, contact me at website@nepyutsu.com.
